properties.entry: SELECT DATE_FORMAT( so.purchase_date, "%Y-%m" ) AS P_DATE, srpr.REAL_SKU , SUM(soi.Quantity_Ordered) AS QUANTITY, 'TOTAL' as TYPE,'' as ASIN FROM sc_order_item soi , sc_order so ,sc_real_product_rel srpr WHERE soi.Order_ID = so.ORDER_ID AND srpr.SKU = soi.Seller_SKU AND srpr.REAL_SKU = '{@#sku#}' and so.purchase_date BETWEEN DATE_SUB( DATE_FORMAT( DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),"%Y-%m-01"),"%Y-%m-01 00:00:00"),INTERVAL 12 MONTH) AND NOW() GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT( so.purchase_date, "%Y-%m" ) , srpr.REAL_SKU UNION SELECT DATE_FORMAT( so.purchase_date, "%Y-%m" ) AS P_DATE, srpr.SKU AS REAL_SKU , SUM(soi.Quantity_Ordered) AS QUANTITY , 'ITEM' as TYPE,soi.ASIN FROM sc_order_item soi , sc_order so ,sc_real_product_rel srpr WHERE soi.Order_ID = so.ORDER_ID AND srpr.SKU = soi.Seller_SKU AND srpr.REAL_SKU = '{@#sku#}' AND so.purchase_date BETWEEN DATE_SUB( DATE_FORMAT( DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),"%Y-%m-01"),"%Y-%m-01 00:00:00"),INTERVAL 12 MONTH) AND NOW() GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT( so.purchase_date, "%Y-%m" ) , srpr.SKU,soi.ASIN
